name: Hot and Tangy German Potato Salad
author: Barb0607
summary: Delicious, tangy German potato salad is a great side dish for bratwurst.
directions: Place potatoes into a large pot and cover with water; season water with salt and bring to a boil
Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until potatoes are tender, about 20 minutes; drain
Put potatoes in a slow cooker
Place bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, about 10 minutes
Remove the bacon slices to a plate lined with paper towels
Crumble bacon and add to potatoes
Return skillet to medium heat and reheat bacon drippings
Cook and stir sweet onions in the drippings until translucent, 5 to 7 minutes; add garlic and continue cooking until fragrant, 1 to 2 minutes more
Pour onion mixture over the potatoes and bacon
Stir vinegar, water, sugar, and salt together in a bowl; pour over the potato mixture
Cook on Low, stirring occasionally, 3 to 4 hours
